key_risks: Regulatory and environmental pressures requiring significant investments
Supply chain disruptions due to COVID-19, labor shortages, and logistical bottlenecks
High competition in the packaging industry
controversies: Criticism over insufficient reduction in carbon footprint and plastic usage
Analyst concerns regarding strategic direction and leverage
environmental_issues: Exposure to regulations on single-use plastics and packaging waste
Need for substantial investments in sustainable packaging alternatives
social_issues: Impact of supply chain disruptions on workforce and communities
governance_issues: Strategic uncertainties and mixed analyst ratings
Concerns over execution of sustainability goals and strategic transformation
